AI.​CmdrAI.​CmdrAITarget

A general reference to a target that can be used in AI where the type of target can vary.

Not actually a class, but a set of functions and macros.

See <CmdrAction.TARGET_TYPE>

Functions
IS_NULL_TARGET
Parameters
target

the CmdrAITarget to test

Returns: Boolean, true if the CmdrAITarget is null

Target_fnc_GetPos

Get the position of the target, if it can be evaluated.

Parameters
_world

AI.CmdrAI.Model.WorldModel, world with which to lookup the target (if required)

_targetObj

AI.CmdrAI.CmdrAITarget, the target to get the position of.

Returns: Position

Target_fnc_GetLabel

Get a text label for the target, useful for debugging.

Parameters
_world

AI.CmdrAI.Model.WorldModel, world with which to lookup the target (if required)

_targetObj

AI.CmdrAI.CmdrAITarget, the target to get the position of.

_default

String, defaults to "invalid", default value to return if the target cannot be resolved.

Returns: String
